title: Number of vehicles imported into the United States by country 2012
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Imports in units for 5 number of Countrys.
The Imports in units is appeared to be the highest at Country Japan and lowest at Country Germany.
The highest Country Japan has 1645177.0 more Imports in units than the lowest Country Germany.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Imports in units in the y axis.
